item.description:
MARK YOUR SOCIAL CALENDER; UPDATE YOUR BLACKBERRY, IPHONE, AND CALENDER SECTION WITH THE DATE BELOW.



ANOTHER SPECTUAR HAPPY HOUR WITH THE IRA!





PRE VALENTINE’S HAPPY HOUR EVENT (Who Knows- You may meet your Sweet Heart at this event)



WHEN: February 11 2010, Thursday

WHERE: Tango, 2935 Main Street, Glastonbury, CT 06033. 860-657-4527. (Very easy to find, so please do not panic)



DETAILS/SMALL PRINT



Simply Stated - Tango is AWESOME, FRIENDLY, FUNKY, GREAT FOOD AND AND MOUTH-WATERING COCKTAILS. HAPPY HOUR SPECIALS ROCK THE HOUSE!!!! (And it is not EXPENSIVE)



SEE: WWW: CTTANGO.COM FOR PICTURES AND DESCRIPTION. The Web Site has Color and Flash!!!



DRINK SPECIALS: For happy hour are $2 bud light drafts, $3 amstel light and Sam Adams seasonal draft beer, $4 white and red wine, $5 red and white sangria, $5 Smirnoff drinks, $ 5 House Martinis.



FOOD SPECIALS: Buy One item from the Tapas menu and Get One FREE. Yes, Free!!!! I was there this past Monday, and the Tapas were delicious and plentiful.



The Above Specials are till 7:00PM. We will have our own area in the Funky Bar Reserved for The Ira’s Singles Group. We can stay as late as we want!!!



R.S.V.P: Please let me know if you are joining on or before February 10 Wednesday , so I may keep the Restaurant informed how many Happy Hour Playful folks are joining. If you say yes, please do come, if you change your mind, please let me know. This is only fair to me and the Restaurant. Thank you.



R.S.V.P: Mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line, Tango Happy Hour. Questions: Ira- 860-604-5792. (A $1.00 suggested donation for Meet up,more is okay as well. LOL)
item.how_to_find_us: Large Group of Singles Having Fun. Sign will be posted . In the back of the Bar Area

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Ira's Pre Valentine's Happy Hour Event.
